useOrderWidgetPopover: When clicking on a price from the orderbook, an order pop-up will not appear, but the information in the order submit widget will change
showZeroVolumeItemsLabel: Show order prices with zero volume
showSpreadItemsLabel: Show prices between the best buy/sell prices
biggestVolumeHint: The volume cell will be highlighted with standard buy/sell colors. The percentage of cell filling with color is determined by the ratio of the cell volume to the maximum volume in the orderbook.
VolumeBoundsWithFixedValueHint: The color of the cell is determined by the settings below. For selection, the option with the largest volume will be selected, for which the condition is met: cell volume >= option volume. The percentage of cell filling with color is determined by the ratio of the cell volume to the value of the "Volume bar fullness" setting.
workingVolumesHint: Used to quickly place orders with the given volume
workingVolumeMinError: Value should be greater than zero
autoAlignIntervalHint: Input '0' or leave blank field to disable auto alignment
